title: A Review of the Vagina Monologues, with Suggestions for Penis Monologues
description: In The Vagina Monologues, women tell their own stories about an intimate body part. Funny and sometimes sad, the play celebrates women and transgress myths and stereotypes. Nothing is taboo in this play. This review also wonders what men would say if they produced The Penis Monologues.
author: Jane F. Gilgun
